Blog

You need to be able to run JavaScript for this to work.

This site does use Google Analytics for basic tracking (IP addresses not recorded), and a few third parties collect a few cookies on its own. If you don't consent to these, either stop using this site or just block them in some way, like with a firewall or with Adblock Plus, uBlock Origin, or similar.
